title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Mitsubishi Triton 2006-15 ML MN 2.5L Challenger 4D56 – ProVent Catch Can Vehicle Specific Kit OS-PROV-05-4WD

content.rendered:
MANN ProVent 200 Kit OS-PROV-05-4WD suits:

Mitsubishi Triton 2006-2015 ML MN / Challenger

2.5L DI-D 4D56 Common Rail

** ONLY 4WD 130 kW

MANN+HUMMEL ProVent Catch Can’s separate oil from the air intake and saves costly repairs due to blocked EGR’S, Turbo’s & intercoolers.

Advantages: • Highly efficient oil separation providing ideal protection for the turbocharger and other components installed downstream • Low pressure loss • Less motor oil consumption in comparison to less efficient separators or conventional open systems • Maintenance friendly: fittings are not removed during element maintenance• No electrical energy required • Universal usage: exceptional for variable flow rates • Low running costs • Compact design • Integrated safety feature against irregularly high crankcase pressure • Light and robust design

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Stainless Steel Bracket

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

Download PDF Installation Instructions >
